headline: IDEXX Laboratories (IDXX) Reports an “Amazing Quarter” – Jim Cramer Calls It a “Safety Stock”
summary: We recently published a list of Jim Cramer On 9 Stocks That Are Rallying Despite Tariff Worries. In this article, we are going to take a look at where IDEXX Laboratories, Inc. (NASDAQ:IDXX) stands against other stocks that Jim Cramer discusses as rallying despite tariff worries. On Monday, Jim Cramer, the host of Mad Money, […]
